title: Please Stop Pointing & Laughing
description:
Jay and Dan are face to face in studio for today's show and discuss Madonna's sex appeal & how Jay wants his penis cut off in death. The guys talk Ben Simmons sliding into a friend's girlfriends DMs and watch a disgruntled preacher who is very against volunteer firefighters. They put the question out to the campers "What celebrity would you enjoy you partner sleeping with?" 

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com
